title: New Champion! Camille's here!
body:
So a comic is out and she definitely reminds me of that girl from Kingsman: The Secret Service for having blades as legs :P

Here's the link to Surrender@20: http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/11/camille-severed-ties.html#more

replies.body: Love comics, we definitely needs more comics imo.

Love everything, we definitely need more of everything imo :D

I might be biased, but it seems to me that some champions get somewhat biased release buildup, but then I understand that if they were to be on the same scope, they'd get boring, and if you tried to make everything better after the other, we're gonna break a certain limit.

Ahh welp, the decisions a company has to make :P
That Attack on Titan rope swing tho.
